directions: Halve eggs lengthwise. Carefully remove yolks to a small bowl and mash with a fork; add mayonnaise, pickles, honey mustard, and black pepper. Blend the mixture until smooth.
Scoop yolk mixture into egg halves; garnish with paprika. Keep refrigerated until ready to serve.
ingredients: 1 tablespoon honey mustard, or more to taste
title: Bread and Butter Pickle Deviled Eggs
